project_descr: Feasibility Study for commercial Production of Bio-fuels from Arundo donax in mined out areas around Moengo in the Republic of Suriname.

outputs.output_descr: The primary goal of the feasibility study, which is supported by pilot scale activities, is to establish the agronomic and techno-economic viability of Arundo donax plantations within the mined-out areas of the Moengo region.

project_title: feasibility bio-fuel production from arundo donax
